transcript.text:
￼












Common Setup
Setup Domain Name

4 min
the right domain name builds up your brand having a domain name indicates that your business is up to date with emerging technologies at onprintshop, we help you to set up your domain name domain names are easily available at various domain service providers, and it helps you add credibility to your business we strongly recommend you buy a domain name and integrate it with your onprintshop web store let us check out next how to set up your domain name with your web store follow the multistep guide below 1 buy a domain name 1 buy a domain name buy a perfect domain name for your web store from any leading domain name service provider the buying process of the domain name is called domain name registration there are various domain registrars such as godaddy, bigrock, namecheap, hostgator, etc 2 get an ip address from onprintshop support 2 get an ip address from onprintshop support after buying the domain, take help from onprintshop support to get an ip address for your store 3 update a record 3 update a record using the given ip address to update the a record from your domain control panel note this may take 24 48 hours 4 connect with onprintshop support team 4 connect with onprintshop support team after setting the a record, email your domain name to support\@onprintshop com note technical support is available from monday friday from 10 am to 10 pm (ist) 5 domain parking 5 domain parking after emailing us the details, set back and relax! the onprintshop team will park your domain name into the hosting panel
Did this page help you?
